_header: Thy lust that lasteth but awhile
_description: On voluptas carnis — two long lines rhyming aa or a quatrain rhyming abcb

OxfMert248.Transcription:
Þi lust þat lasteþ but a wile þou it be breme and
                    likeit deþ þe for to sike sore and lite loue and sore for to
                    sike
